Record_string.any_.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

ValidationErrorResponse.description:
Validation error response (400)
Used when request validation fails

ErrorResponse.description:
Standard error response
Used for all error responses (4xx and 5xx)

PhotoUploadData.description:
Photo upload response
Returned after successfully uploading a photo

resource_id.description: Unique identifier for the uploaded resource

url.description: URL to access the uploaded photo

mimetype.description: MIME type of the uploaded file

uploaded_at.description: Timestamp when the file was uploaded

Record_string.string_.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

ValidationErrorClass.description: Validation error with optional field-level details

Unauthorized.description:
Unauthorized error response (401)
Used when authentication is required but not provided or invalid

Forbidden.description:
Forbidden error response (403)
Used when user is authenticated but lacks required permissions

TokenCreationResponse.description: Token creation response (includes the actual token value)

token.description: The actual token value (only shown on creation)

contractor_spectrum_ids.description: Contractor Spectrum IDs this token can access

NotFound.description:
Not found error response (404)
Used when requested resource does not exist

contractor_spectrum_ids.description: Contractor Spectrum IDs this token can access

data.name: Stanton
data.description: A star system in the United Empire of Earth

MinimalContractor.description:
Minimal contractor information
Used across multiple endpoints for contractor references

MinimalUser.description:
Minimal user information (API response format)
Used across multiple endpoints for user references

ShopOwner.description: Shop owner (can be user or contractor)

PaymentType.description:
Payment type enum
Used across orders, services, and other payment-related endpoints

Conflict.description:
Conflict error response (409)
Used when request conflicts with current state (e.g., duplicate resource)

SuccessMessageResponse.description:
Success message response
Used for operations that return a simple success message

ServiceUnavailable.description:
Service unavailable error response (503)
Used when a required service is temporarily unavailable

UpdatePushPreferencePayload.description: Update push preference payload (single or batch)

PrometheusQueryResponse.description:
Prometheus query response
Note: Uses any for result to support Prometheus-specific tuple format [timestamp, value]

PrometheusSeriesResponse.description:
Prometheus series response
Note: Uses any for data to support Prometheus-specific format

UpdateProfilePayload.description:
Payload for updating user profile
All fields are optional

assigned_to.description: Assigned user ID (optional, null to unassign)

contractor.description: Contractor spectrum ID (optional, for org applications)

OfferMarketListing.description: Market listing item in an offer

counter_offer.description: Counter offer details (required if status is counteroffered)

OfferSessionStub.description: Offer session stub (minimal info for lists)

offer_session_ids.description: Array of offer session IDs to merge (minimum 2)

reported_url.description: Relative URL path of the reported content (e.g., '/listing/123', '/service/456')

report_details.description: Additional details about the report (max 1000 characters)

ModerationUser.description: Minimal user information for moderation reports

AdminContentReport.description: Content report with user information (admin view)

notes.description: Moderation notes or action taken (max 2000 characters)

MarketListing.description:
Market listing entity
Represents a single market listing (unique, aggregate, or multiple)

user_seller_id.description: User seller ID (if sold by user)

contractor_seller_id.description: Contractor seller ID (if sold by contractor)

internal.description: Whether listing is internal to contractor

minimum_bid_increment.description: Minimum bid increment for auction listings

current_bid.description: Current highest bid for auction listings

MarketListingResponse.description: Response containing a single market listing

CreateMarketListingPayload.description: Payload for creating a new market listing

internal.description: Whether listing is internal to contractor

UpdateMarketListingPayload.description:
Payload for updating a market listing
All fields are optional

UpdateEmailPreferencePayload.description: Update email preference payload (single or batch)

contractor.description: Optional contractor spectrum ID (for contractor offers)

PaymentTypes.description:
TypeScript type for payment types
Can be used for function parameters and return types

Commodity.description: Commodity data from UEX Corp API

AttributeDefinition.description:
Attribute definition entity
Represents a definition for an attribute that can be applied to game items

allowed_values.description: Allowed values for select/multiselect types (null for range/text)

applicable_item_types.description: Item types this attribute applies to (null means all types)

display_order.description: Display order in UI (lower numbers appear first)

show_in_filters.description: Whether to show this attribute in filter UI

count.description: Number of game items with this value

AttributeDefinitionResponse.description: Response containing a single attribute definition

CreateAttributeDefinitionPayload.description:
Payload for creating a new attribute definition
Admin-only operation

applicable_item_types.description: Item types this attribute applies to (optional, null means all types)

display_order.description: Display order in UI (optional, defaults to 999)

show_in_filters.description: Whether to show this attribute in filter UI (optional, defaults to true)

UpdateAttributeDefinitionPayload.description:
Payload for updating an existing attribute definition
Admin-only operation
All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated

applicable_item_types.description: Item types this attribute applies to

show_in_filters.description: Whether to show this attribute in filter UI

GameItemAttribute.description:
Game item attribute entity
Represents an attribute value assigned to a specific game item

attribute_value.description: Value of the attribute for this game item

GameItemAttributeResponse.description: Response containing a single game item attribute

UpsertGameItemAttributePayload.description:
Payload for upserting a game item attribute
Admin-only operation

attribute_name.description: Name of the attribute (must exist in attribute_definitions)

attribute_value.description: Value to assign (must be in allowed_values if defined)

DeleteGameItemAttributeResponse.description: Response for successful game item attribute deletion

post.description:
Upload a photo

Uploads a single photo file with validation for size and type.
The file is uploaded to the CDN and a resource ID is returned.

File requirements:
- Maximum size: 2.5MB
- Allowed types: image/jpeg, image/png, image/gif, image/webp

Get user profile by username

Retrieves a user's public profile by username.

Search user profiles

200.description: List of orders matching search criteria

get.description:
Search orders

Search for orders with various filters.
Requires authentication and appropriate permissions.

Get contractor order metrics

Retrieves order metrics for a specific contractor.
Requires membership in the contractor organization.

Get contractor order data

Retrieves comprehensive order data for a contractor.
Requires contractor authorization.

Get user order data

Retrieves order data for the authenticated user.

Get order by ID

Retrieves detailed information about a specific order.
Requires authentication and authorization to view the order.

put.description:
Update order

Updates an existing order.
Can update status, assigned user, or contractor.

post.description:
Create order

Creates a new order.
Validates contractor, assignee, and permissions.

Apply to order

Apply to an order as a user or on behalf of a contractor.

Accept contractor applicant

Accept a contractor's application to an order.
Requires order ownership.

Accept user applicant

Accept a user's application to an order.
Requires order ownership.

Create order thread

Creates a Discord thread for an order.
Requires order ownership.

get.description:
Search market listings

Search and filter market listings with pagination.
Supports filtering by item type, status, price range, and more.

post.description:
Create a new market listing

Creates a new market listing. Requires authentication.

get.description:
Get market listing details

Retrieves detailed information about a specific market listing.

put.description:
Update a market listing

Updates an existing market listing. Only the owner can update.

parameters.description: ID of the listing to update
parameters.name: listing_id

post.description:
Get stats for multiple market listings

Retrieves statistics (views, orders, revenue) for multiple listings.
Only accessible by listing owners.

Update listing quantity

Updates the available quantity for a listing.
Only accessible by listing owners.

Refresh listing expiration

Extends the expiration date of a listing.
Only accessible by listing owners.

Track a view on a market listing

Records a view on a listing for analytics purposes.
Public endpoint, no authentication required.

get.description:
Get user's chats

Retrieves all chats for the authenticated user.
Includes the most recent message for each chat.

post.description:
Create chat

Creates a new chat with specified users.
If a chat with the same participants already exists, returns success without creating a duplicate.

get.description:
Get chat by ID

Retrieves detailed information about a specific chat.
Requires authentication and authorization to view the chat.

Get chat by order ID

Retrieves the chat associated with a specific order.
Requires authentication and authorization to view the order.

Get chat by offer session ID

Retrieves the chat associated with a specific offer session.
Requires authentication and authorization to view the offer.

post.description:
Send message

Sends a message to a chat.
Requires authentication and authorization to participate in the chat.

get.description:
Get all attribute definitions

Retrieves all attribute definitions, optionally filtered by applicable item types.
Attribute definitions define the schema for attributes that can be applied to game items.

parameters.description: Include hidden attribute definitions (defaults to false)
parameters.name: include_hidden

post.description:
Create a new attribute definition

Creates a new attribute definition that can be applied to game items.
Only administrators can create attribute definitions.

200.description: List of distinct attribute values with counts

get.description:
Search for distinct attribute values

Searches for distinct values of a specific attribute across all game items.
Useful for autocomplete and filter UI components.

parameters.description: Name of the attribute to search values for (required)
parameters.name: attribute_name

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 20, max: 50)
parameters.name: limit

put.description:
Update an existing attribute definition

Updates an existing attribute definition. All fields are optional.
Only administrators can update attribute definitions.

parameters.description: Name of the attribute to update
parameters.name: attribute_name

delete.description:
Delete an attribute definition

Deletes an attribute definition. Optionally cascade delete all game item attributes.
Only administrators can delete attribute definitions.

parameters.description: Name of the attribute to delete
parameters.name: attribute_name

parameters.description: Whether to cascade delete all game item attributes (default: false)
parameters.name: cascade

200.description: Created or updated game item attribute

put.description:
Upsert a game item attribute

Creates or updates an attribute value for a specific game item.
Only administrators can modify game item attributes.

delete.description:
Delete a game item attribute

Removes a specific attribute from a game item.
Only administrators can delete game item attributes.

parameters.description: Name of the attribute to delete
parameters.name: attribute_name

parameters.name: format

parameters.name: page_size

parameters.name: start_date

parameters.name: end_date

Unlink user's Star Citizen account
Admin endpoint to unlink a user's Star Citizen account, returning them to unverified status

Test notification with real data
